description: Brigadier General Basque Grand is one of the higher ranking officers in the Amestrian Military and a prominent State Alchemist known as the "Iron Blood Alchemist". Like http://anidb.net/ch6586 [Roy Mustang], Grand was a legend of the Ishval Civil War and has gained much notoriety for his actions on the Eastern battlefield. He is known among the ranks as a master of hand-to-hand combat in addition to his significant alchemical abilities, but was nonetheless murdered by Scar early in the series.
name: Basque Grand
